text.*:
This user is a member of the
Philosophy of language
task force.

Use[edit]

To join the Philosophy of language task force, add your username to:

  • Wikipedia:WikiProject Philosophy/participants/Philosophy of language task force

If you place {{User WP Phil of language}} on your user page, this template will display the userbox above and will add your user page to:

  • Category:Philosophy of language task force members
  • Category:WikiProject Philosophy members
